name: Video Conferencing with Zoom
author: Deepen Bajracharya

sections.description:
Video conferencing with Zoom plugin gives you the extensive functionality to manage your Zoom Meetings, Webinars, Recordings, Users, Reports from your WordPress Dashboard directly. The plugin is a great tool for managing your Zoom sessions on the fly without needing to go back and forth on multiple platforms. This plugin is developed in order to make smooth transitions in managing your online meetings or webinars without any hassle and time loss.

View the plugin live demo from here.

FEATURES:

  • Manage your Zoom Meetings and Zoom Webinars.
  • Manage Zoom users and Reports.
  • Change frontend layouts as per your needs using template override.
  • Join via browser directly without Zoom App.
  • Show User recordings based on Zoom Account.
  • Extensive Developer Friendly
  • Shortcodes
  • Import your Zoom Meetings into your WordPress Dashboard in one click.
  • Gutenberg Blocks Support
  • Elementor Support

ADDON FEATURES

  • Recurring meetings and Webinars (PRO)
  • Enable registrations (PRO)
  • Webhooks (PRO)
  • Use PMI (PRO)
  • WCFM Integration ( See EXTENDING AND MAKING MEETINGS PURCHASABLE section )
  • WooCommerce Integration ( See EXTENDING AND MAKING MEETINGS PURCHASABLE section )
  • WooCommerce Appointments Integration ( See EXTENDING AND MAKING MEETINGS PURCHASABLE section )
  • WooCommerce Bookings Integration ( See EXTENDING AND MAKING MEETINGS PURCHASABLE section )
    and more…

DOCUMENTATION LINKS:

  • Installation
  • Shortcodes
  • Documentation
  • Usage Documentation /w WP
  • Webhooks

EXTENDING AND MAKING MEETINGS PURCHASABLE:

Addon: Video Conferencing with Zoom Pro:
Addon: WooCommerce Integration:
Addon: WCFM Integration:
Addon: WooCommerce Booking Integration:
Addon: Booked Appointments Integration:
Addon: WooCommerce Appointments Integration:

You can find more information on the Pro version on website: codemanas.com

OVERRIDDING TEMPLATES:

If you use Zoom Meetings > Add new section i.e Post Type meetings then you might need to override the template. Currently this plugin supports default templates.

REFER FAQ to override page templates!

COMPATIBILITY:

  • Enables direct integration of Zoom into WordPress.
  • Compatible with LearnPress, LearnDash 3.
  • Enables most of the settings from zoom via admin panel.
  • Provides Shortcode to conduct the meeting via any WordPress page/post or custom post type pages
  • Separate Admin area to manage all meetings.
  • Can add meeting links via shortcode to your WooCommerce product pages as well.
  • Gutenberg
  • Elementor
  • Beaver Builder

CONTRIBUTING

There’s a GIT repository if you want to contribute a patch. Please check issues. Pull requests are welcomed and your contributions will be appreciated.

Please consider giving a 5 star thumbs up if you found this useful.

Lastly, Thank you all to those contributors who have contributed for this plugin in one or the other way. Taking from language translations to minor or major suggestions. We appreciate your input in every way !!

QUICK DEMO:
sections.installation: Search for the plugin -> add new dialog and click install, or download and extract the plugin, and copy the the Zoom plugin folder into your wp-content/plugins directory and activate.
sections.faq:
Migrating from JWT to Server to Server method

As of June 2023, Zoom will deprecate JWT App type – the plugin has moved to Server-to-Server OAuth App and SDK App type for Join via Browser / Web SDK support. If you face any Zoom connection issues then this might be the issue. Refer to this Documentation on how to migrate your old JWT method.

Join via Browser showing Signature Invalid or Timeout

Please check if you SDK app type is activated and re-check all the app credentials are valid.

Updating to version 4.0.0

Please check how you can do the Migration from JWT

Add users not working for me

The plugin settings allow you to add and manage users. But, you should remember that you can add users in accordance with the Zoom Plans, so they will be active for the chosen plan. More information about Zoom pricing plans you can find here: https://zoom.us/pricing

Join via Browser not working, Camera and Audio not detected

This issue is because of HTTPS protocol. You need to use HTTPS to be able to allow browser to send audio and video.

Blank page for Single Meetings page

If you face blank page in this situation you should refer to Template Overriding and see Template override section.

This happens because of the single meeting page template from the plugin not being supported by your theme and i cannot make my plugin support for every theme page template because of which you’ll need to override the plugin template from my plugin to your theme’s standard. ( Basically, like how WooCommerce does!! )

Countdown not showing/ guess is undefined error in my console log

If countdown is not working for you then the first thing you’ll nweed to verify is whether your meeting got created successfully or not. You can do so by going to wp-admin > Zoom Meetings > Select your created meeting and on top right check if there are “Start Meeting”, “join Meeting links”. If there are those links then, you are good on meeting.

However, even though meeting is created and you are not seeing countdown timer then, you might want to check your browser console and see if there is any “guess is undefined” error. If so, there might be a plugin conflict using the same moment.js library. Report to me in this case

Forminator plugin conflict fix

Please check this thread: https://wordpress.org/support/topic/conflict-with-forminator-2/

How to show Zoom Meetings on Front

  • By using shortcode like [zoom_api_link meeting_id=”123456789″] you can show the link of your meeting in front.

How to override plugin template to your theme

  1. Goto wp-content/plugins/video-conferencing-with-zoom-api/templates
  2. Goto your active theme folder to create new folder. Create a folder such as yourtheme/video-conferencing-zoom/{template-file.php}
  3. Replace template-file.php with the file you need to override.
  4. Overriding shortcode template is also the same process inside folder templates/shortcode

Do i need a Zoom Account ?

Yes, you should be registered in Zoom. Also, depending on the zoom account plan you are using – Number of hosts/users will vary.

Cool

By thomasgafo on March 8, 2024

This is an improvement.

The best form builder!

By elbermontiel on February 12, 2024

Great Plugin!

Fantastic working plugin

By Richard (r2ymedia) on January 30, 2024

Recently I changed a clients zoom plugin to your plugin and I am absolutely convinced to use it on more client websites, because it is very user-friendly, very fast installed and working seamlessly with Zoom. Also there is great features like a list of inscriptions and the plugin works fine also in an DIVI environment.

Muy satisfecho

By Fernando (fernandomartinirun) on December 31, 2023

Excelente complemento, muy recomendable, es claro que detr'as hay un programador claro en las necesidades de sus usuarios.

Terribly Complicated to Set Up in 2023 version

By Health Glows (biljnaishrana) on December 12, 2023

Dear developer,

I have read your message "Before you Rate", and I hear you.

Please, give us a well narrated video guide on how to set up this plug in.

This:
https: // zoomdocs . codemanas . com / setup /

Not valid!

Works great - hart to set up

By auroram42 on November 8, 2023

Zoom plugin works great for hosting zoom meetings that don't need a participant to download the app. Also takes care of security issues when participants use 3rd party apps to join.

The setup is a real hassle (because zoom requires you to create an "app" for any 3rd party access to your meetings. You cannot just copy/paste an API key like with other integrations. This is not a fault of the plugin, but rather with zoom. Make sure you pick the right OAuth app type - there are two of them.

We teach online classes for kids and "helpful" zoom features like requesting access and sharing drawings can't be disabled if a participant uses an old version of the zoom client or certain 3rd party clients. Imagine a class full of kids and some of them have the ability to draw over the presenter (mustache and ears anyone?), or to click the "request to share screen" button 100 times (each time it pops up a message for the host).

This plugin gets rid of all those "features" that zoom devs assume won't be an issue (I mean why would any reasonable adult click to request screen sharing 100 times? Obviously they have never talked to a group of young kids :-)

Anyway, great plugin once you get past the "zoom app" setup.

Does not respond or assist when their paid product doesn't work

By ibanezrg770 on November 8, 2023

I purchased both their Video Conference with Zoom Pro and Zoom Integration with WooCommerce plugins and they have not worked properly since installation. I have sent them 3 emails and they have yet to respond. I am now passed my refund date so they have taken my money. I would avoid this developer and his company. codemanas.com

Pretty Good so far

By breakofdawnink on October 12, 2023

I haven’t really used it a lot, but it seems to work pretty well. Pretty simple to set up.

Great but loosing feature

By adelaidedownee on June 14, 2023

Great plugin, but WCFM sucks.

Do you have any plan to add support for MultiVendorX? That would help a lot.

Great Plugin

By Takashi Hosoya (tkc49) on May 28, 2023

Outstanding plugin! It lets me manage all my Zoom activities directly from my WordPress dashboard. With a rich feature set and strong compatibility, this plugin is a game-changer. Highly recommended!

short_description: Gives you the power to manage Zoom Meetings, Zoom Webinars, Recordings, Reports and create users directly from your WordPress dashboard.
description:
Video conferencing with Zoom plugin gives you the extensive functionality to manage your Zoom Meetings, Webinars, Recordings, Users, Reports from your WordPress Dashboard directly. The plugin is a great tool for managing your Zoom sessions on the fly without needing to go back and forth on multiple platforms. This plugin is developed in order to make smooth transitions in managing your online meetings or webinars without any hassle and time loss.

View the plugin live demo from here.

FEATURES:

  • Manage your Zoom Meetings and Zoom Webinars.
  • Manage Zoom users and Reports.
  • Change frontend layouts as per your needs using template override.
  • Join via browser directly without Zoom App.
  • Show User recordings based on Zoom Account.
  • Extensive Developer Friendly
  • Shortcodes
  • Import your Zoom Meetings into your WordPress Dashboard in one click.
  • Gutenberg Blocks Support
  • Elementor Support

ADDON FEATURES

  • Recurring meetings and Webinars (PRO)
  • Enable registrations (PRO)
  • Webhooks (PRO)
  • Use PMI (PRO)
  • WCFM Integration ( See EXTENDING AND MAKING MEETINGS PURCHASABLE section )
  • WooCommerce Integration ( See EXTENDING AND MAKING MEETINGS PURCHASABLE section )
  • WooCommerce Appointments Integration ( See EXTENDING AND MAKING MEETINGS PURCHASABLE section )
  • WooCommerce Bookings Integration ( See EXTENDING AND MAKING MEETINGS PURCHASABLE section )
    and more…

DOCUMENTATION LINKS:

  • Installation
  • Shortcodes
  • Documentation
  • Usage Documentation /w WP
  • Webhooks

EXTENDING AND MAKING MEETINGS PURCHASABLE:

Addon: Video Conferencing with Zoom Pro:
Addon: WooCommerce Integration:
Addon: WCFM Integration:
Addon: WooCommerce Booking Integration:
Addon: Booked Appointments Integration:
Addon: WooCommerce Appointments Integration:

You can find more information on the Pro version on website: codemanas.com

OVERRIDDING TEMPLATES:

If you use Zoom Meetings > Add new section i.e Post Type meetings then you might need to override the template. Currently this plugin supports default templates.

REFER FAQ to override page templates!

COMPATIBILITY:

  • Enables direct integration of Zoom into WordPress.
  • Compatible with LearnPress, LearnDash 3.
  • Enables most of the settings from zoom via admin panel.
  • Provides Shortcode to conduct the meeting via any WordPress page/post or custom post type pages
  • Separate Admin area to manage all meetings.
  • Can add meeting links via shortcode to your WooCommerce product pages as well.
  • Gutenberg
  • Elementor
  • Beaver Builder

CONTRIBUTING

There’s a GIT repository if you want to contribute a patch. Please check issues. Pull requests are welcomed and your contributions will be appreciated.

Please consider giving a 5 star thumbs up if you found this useful.

Lastly, Thank you all to those contributors who have contributed for this plugin in one or the other way. Taking from language translations to minor or major suggestions. We appreciate your input in every way !!
